title: Part motion given logarithmic velocity f part - d

content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity v at time t, for 0≤t≤5 , is given by v(t)=ln(t2-3t+3). The particle is at position x=8 at time t=0.
content.question: Find the average speed of the particle over the interval <math> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> t </mi> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mn> 2. </mn> </mrow> </math>

frqParts.text: Find the average speed of the particle over the interval <math> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> t </mi> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mn> 2. </mn> </mrow> </math>

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
